ðŸ“– Summary: Presenterm is a Rust-based tool that enables users to create and present slideshows directly from the terminal using markdown files. It supports a variety of features including image and animated GIF integration, customizable themes, code highlighting, and export options to PDF and HTML. The tool aims to provide a flexible and efficient way to deliver presentations in a terminal environment.
